body.para: First of all a Happy New Year to all of you.

With the present message I would like to enquire if any of you are aware of any extra-curricular taxonomy courses (e.g. as organised by museums, research institutes, NGO's, ...) that are currently being organised in your country? I am especially interested to find out what initiatives developing countries have already or are planning to set up. Additionally, any information on the programmes set up by the developed countries for researchers from developing countries would also be greatly appreciated. The courses I am interested in may range from the graduate to the postgraduate level.
Needless to say perhaps, but all information will greatly enhance our efforts to finetune the Belgian contribution to the Global Taxonomy Initiative.
